extendedInfo.description: Introducing the official Cross County Shopping Center app â your digital shopping center companion.MALL DIRECTORY â browse by category or view stores alphabetically with detailed info, map location and phone number for every retailer or dining establishment. Even get a quick glance if the store currently has a sale.INTERACTIVE MAP â search for and display the location of individual stores and closest parking, as well as restrooms, escalators, elevators, ATMs and other mall amenities.SALES & EVENTS â view a detailed listing of sales and events going on at the center and even create a favorites list to help plan your shopping trip.WHERE DID I PARK? â save your parking location by using your phoneâs GPS, taking a photo, recording a voice note or typing a text reminder to easily locate your vehicle.MOVIE THEATER INFORMATION â view movie descriptions, show times and even purchase tickets online.SHOPPING LIST â get organized by creating a custom shopping list. For every item on your list, select the retailers youâd like to visit and locate them on the mall map with one touch. You can even email your shopping list for others to view.CENTER INFORMATION â view shopping hours, center address and phone number, guest services information, weather forecast and more.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app is so convenient. Easy to use. Dont have to have individual apps for all the stores in the mall! Movie times, dining and retail stores all in one app. Great job by the developer!
reviews.author: A Google User
